timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText:
AFAIK, other than documentation there is no benefit to have a describe block that simply wraps a single it or test statement - only if there was also some other logic such as a before or after. That also extends to even if the describe only had multiple it/test blocks but no other blocks or statements in it.
So I'd suggest we remove all those type of describes here and below, and simply rework the it description to cover it.
